ai.grakn.graql.admin

Interface VarAdmin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Pattern, PatternAdmin, Var

    public interface VarAdmin
extends PatternAdmin, Var
    Admin class for inspecting a Var
    Author:
    Felix Chapman

      • getPrintableName

        String getPrintableName()
